User Action: Valid Login
Precondition:
- User is not logged in.
- User has an account.
- System displays a 'Login' link
Expected Results:
- Login page renders.
- User successfully logs in.
- User is forwarded to their profile page.
- 'Login' and 'Sign up' links are no longer visible.
Steps: Click "Login" link || Enter valid username and password || Click 'Login' button

User Action: Invalid Login
Precondition:
- User is not logged in.
- System displays a 'Login' link
Expected Results:
- Login page renders.
- User is not logged in
- User is informed that the password and username did not match
- Remains on the login entry page
- Login fields are cleared
Steps: Click "login" link || Enter a user not registered in the database || Enter a password that does not match any account in the database || Click the "login" button

User Action: Non matching credentials
Precondition:
- User is not logged in.
- System displays a 'Login' link
Expected Results:
- Login page renders.
- User is not logged in
- User is informed that the password and username did not match
- Remains on the login entry page
- Login fields are cleared
Steps: Click the "login" link || Enter a username that is registered in the database || Enter a password that is registered to an account other than that of the username used || Click the "login" button

User Action: Leaving empty fields
Precondition:
- User is not logged in.
- System displays a 'Login' link
Expected Results:
- Login page renders.
- User is not logged in
- User is informed that the password and username did not match
- Remains on the login entry page
- Login fields are cleared
Steps: Click the "login" link || Enter some login credentials, registered or not, leaving one or both fields blank || Click the "login" button

User Action: Overloading fields
Precondition:
- User is not logged in.
- System displays a 'Login' link
Expected Results:
- Login page renders.
- User is not logged in
- User is informed that the password and username did not match
- Remains on the login entry page
- Login fields are cleared
Steps: Click the "login" link || Enter at least more than 100 characters into one or both of the fields || Click the "login" button

User Action: Valid Credentials - Unit Test
Precondition: Database Connection initialised
Expected Results:
JUnit returns true when username:password are valid
JUnit returns false when combination of username:password are invalid
Steps: Launch LoginTest.java, ComparePassword() method

User Action: Valid Registration
Precondition:
- User is not logged in
- System is currently displaying a "register" link
Expected Results:
- An account for the user is created
- The user is now logged in with said account
- User is forwarded to the menu page
Steps: Click the "register" link || Enter valid information in all fields || Click the "register" button

User Action: Leaving Empty Fields
Precondition:
- User is not logged in
- System is currently displaying a "register" link
Expected Results:
- The user will not be logged in
- An account of the given credentials will not be created
- The user is informed the some information was invalid
- The user remains on the register page
- The information in the fields of the register page is cleared
Steps: Click the "register" link || Enter valid information leaving between one and all fields blank || Click the "register" button

User Action: User matches an existing account
Precondition:
- User is not logged in
- System is currently displaying a "register" link
Expected Results:
- The user will not be logged in
- An account of the given credentials will not be created
- The user is informed the some information was invalid
- The user remains on the register page
- The information in the fields of the register page is cleared
Steps: Click the "register" link || Enter information matching that of another entry already in the database || Click the "register" button

User Action: Passwords do not match
Precondition:
- User is not logged in
- System is currently displaying a "register" link
Expected Results:
- The user will not be logged in
- An account of the given credentials will not be created
- The user is informed the some information was invalid
- The user remains on the register page
- The information in the fields of the register page is cleared
Steps: Click the "register" link || Enter all valid information except in the password fields || Enter two different passwords in the "password" and "confirm password" fields || Click the "register" button

User Action: Valid availablity
Precondition:
- A user is logged in as a business account
- The system is displaying an "Edit availability" option
Expected Results:
- The availability times of the employee will be modified
- The user is informed that the changes have been made
- The user remains on the current page
Steps: Click the "Edit availablity || Select an Employee to change availability for || Enter in the times of the fields that need to be changed || Click the "save" button

User Action: Fields left blank
Precondition:
- A user is logged in as a business account
- The system is displaying an "Edit availability" option
Expected Results:
- The availability times of the selected employee will not be changed
- The user is informed that the entered infomation was not valid
- The user remains on the current menu
Steps: Click the "edit availability" link || Select an employee || Enter in some times leaving between one and all fields blank || Click the "complete" or "finish" button

User Action: View Roster
Precondition:
- I am logged in as a business account
- I am on the edit availability page
Expected Results: - I can see each employee's working week ahead

User Action: View All Bookings
Precondition:

- I am on 'Booking' page
Expected Results:

- I can see all of the taken bookings
- I can see all of the bookings for a month in advance
